Mixedbreeds?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Mixedbreeds?
By Monsterfreak on Wednesday, March 13, 2002 - 03:51 pm:

How are you supposed to get mixedbreeds????????

By Eagle Fierce on Wednesday, March 13, 2002 - 11:34 pm:

Firstly, you must collect all of the main breed cards (not sure about having to have a "Phoenix" card, though). I say this because I have never gotten any sub-type cards without having first acquired all the others.

After that, it's pretty much a free for all. Continuously trash your opponent's deck until he/she changes it up. If they have a mixed breed in their new line-up, all you have to do is play them until the day before the end of time (it feels like it's that long) and they'll finally forfeit the card in the ante.

A few definites:

Cue has the "Angel" card

Nelson has the "Black Henger" card

Leon has the "Hare Hound" card (I think)

Sephore always has either the "Rock Dino" or the "Shell Dino" card

I forget the name, but the kid that you get the "Worm" card off of controls the "Corone" card

Alfonse is the sole proprietor of the "Stone Dragon" card

Cocochino possesses the "Fairy Hare" card

"Ironwall" Stolatos either has the "Soboros" card or the "Usazo"(SP, Plant/Suezo) card. Have fun beating his 300mi. Wall deck to get it. :P

Mr. Durahan Master, leader of the BCB, thinks he's so hot *clears throat*...Espada has the "Vesuvius" card

Cue or Pabs (one of them) eventually has the "Buzuli" (SP, Naga/Gali) card

Pixie, fromt the Paradise of Monsters, has a "Night Flyer" card

I believe that Tesca has in his possession the "Knight Mocchi" card

Mocchi, from the Paradise of Monster, has the "Gentle Mocchi" card

I forget who, but one of the members of the Church possess the "Seuzo Mask" card

The guy, with the six pack chest, of the BCB All-Stars has the "Big Blue" card

The spiteful female dog that teased you early on with the "Mew" card, Isabella, later replaces her deck with the "Mum Mew" card


Well, not sure if I missed any or not, but that was what I could gather off the top of my head. Remember that there is always a chance of getting a mixed breed from winning an "A" class match (such as the "Hero's Cup" for instance), provided you have collected the necessary main breeds first. Well, good luck and happy hunting! ^_^

By Lap on Thursday, March 14, 2002 - 01:22 pm:

for the mixed breed how do they give it to you ? do they just say that you can have it?

By Eagle Fierce on Thursday, March 14, 2002 - 11:03 pm:

No, they just eventually forfeit the card in the ante after you consistently trash their revised decks.

By zillarancher on Saturday, July 20, 2002 - 12:25 pm:
